General.Name: Vitura SA
General.Description: Founded in 2006, Vitura is a SIIC specializing in offices in Paris and Greater Paris. The total value of the portfolio was estimated as of June 30, 2023 at EUR 1,436 million excluding duties. Strongly committed to a sustainable development approach, Vitura has obtained the status of world No. 1 in the latest GRESB (Global Real Estate Sustainability Benchmark) ranking among listed office companies, as well as two Gold Awards from EPRA (European Public Real Estate Association) for the quality and transparency of its financial and non-financial communication.
